channel.title: A Chance to Shine!
channel.description:
Note: I wasn't sure where to post this as I am not looking to join or acquire a Development Team... Rather I am only in need of a single developer to fix small issues on a fully functional (and running) source.
Hello! My name is Alex and I am an Administrator for a RSPS that gets around 600 players (Forum Traffic) passing through each day. With your guys' help, I would like to triple that number!
Let me begin by describing what exactly I am offering. Obviously, if you're willing to code for the Server I represent out of goodwill/boredom/what have you, then great! If not, you will need to prove your expertise before I would be willing to offer a monthly stipend.
Next, I would like to give you a brief background on what exactly you would be getting yourself in to (so we're 100% clear ;)). I'll try to refrain from mentioning the RSPS's name in case this is somehow viewed as solicitation or advertising. Basically, the Server I Staff has been around for 4 years and like most servers, it has experienced its ups and downs. Currently, we are swiftly recovering from having maybe 20 players online (max) at any given time to 85ish on a good day. There was a period of a year where, in our second version of the server, we had 150+ on at [i]all[/i] times of the day! With your help, I am sure we can get back there.
I am the Head of Staff for the Server and it would basically be run by you and I. The Owner is somewhat inactive and therefore has charged me with doing most of his handywork. Unfortunately, I am as good at Programming as I am at Juggling (and I'm a bloody awful Juggler). This is why I am looking to contract a coder.
We have a stable source but there a lot of improvements that could be made. (For clarification, WE DO HAVE A WORKING SOURCE, but like most sources, there a quite a bit of flaws that should be fixed so the whole system operates smoother.) Hopefully, you'll be interested by this proposition and Private Message me back so we can work out the details. Together, we can do great things. :)
Respectfully inquisitive,
-Alex

item.title: A Chance to Shine!
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“Dalton59, post:20, topic:452453”]People who dont Respect me, dont deserve my respect…

You either talk to me like a proper human being or get lost. Infact, i dont like Ruby, i just met him on this thread and hes treating me like shit.

Just because it took me 2 years to learn some mysql, doesn’t mean im stupid…i didnt say i have LEARNED mysql for 2 years, im saying ive being doing it for 2 years so far.

I only posted to offer my help towards Encrypted and their rsps, now stop hating please.[/quote]

Hate is truth for people who hate the truth.

Also If you don’t respect people if they don’t respect you, and they think the same, then its IMPOSSIBRO to come to mutual respect,
you probably spend your time on thumblr YOLO’ing

Read full topic

item.title: A Chance to Shine!
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“Dalton59, post:16, topic:452453”]Ruby doesnt even know me? infact he doesnt even know what i can do, who the hell is ruby? is he another faggot on mopar?

  • what i posted isnt for you, its for Encrypted…

Otherwise i will provide more information.

And if he doesnt need a forum manager or a web dev, then ill apply for coder.[/quote]
He’s a fairly widely respected web developer who’s released multiple professional looking website templates. Plus the fact that you call people faggots doesn’t exactly help your standpoint.

Read full topic

item.title: A Chance to Shine!
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“Dalton59, post:13, topic:452453”]Ruby, i didnt come here to listen to haters…if you got nothing nice to say keep it to yourself, i dont even know you…you dont have the right to judge me when you havnt seen anything.

If the owner doesnt need a web developer/forum manager, perhaps then ill apply for coder or so. Id prefer working with forums as i have more experience.[/quote]
I have the right to judge whoever the hell I please, however having the ground to accuse you of being a retard and being able to support it is something else entirely. We can judge and accuse you of being an idiot if you’re saying it took you 2 years to grasp MySQL work, unless you can tell us something that’s actually advanced that you can do.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Dalton59, post:9, topic:452453”]Are you interested in a decent Web Developer? i can do alot of forum installations, modifications, and tons more. Mysql databases etc…2 years experience with VBulletin and SMF, including IPB.

Let me know, ill be more than happy to join the team.

If you dont need a Web Developer, then i can do some server coding, i have 2 years experience with rsps coding, expecially PI sources.[/quote]

The more help the better! Let me talk to the Owner and see if he would like a Website Developer. I’m sure it couldn’t hurt.

Ruby:

Say the name.

Pmed it.
